title: Sofia372
author: Sofia372
content: Gather up for the practical event that will hand you several tips on the protection and recovery of your crypto assets. Today the world is moving rapidly towards digital currency and the most vital thing, in the absence of a centralised regulator, is to be able to protect our crypto assets.In this 3 hours long program, the expert speaker, a founder and CEO of StarCompliance.io - Taras Podgorodetskiy, will share vital insights on crypto security.The detailed program includes:Returning stolen cryptocurrency- How does the process work?- Can an investment be considered theft?- What are the ways to quickly return the funds?Unlocking exchange accounts- Why are accounts being blocked?- What should a trader do if their trading account is blocked?- How to properly work with large trade volumes through exchanges?The talk starts at 6 p.m., on Thursday, June 15th at the restaurant üìç Gaia, DubaiNote: The minimum spend rule in the venue is 150 AED.Don‚Äôt miss such a rare event, where you can get practical advice, see sample cases and ensure your crypto assets will never be lost.CÔªøontact me: +971545189077 AlexaE-mail1podgorodetskaya.a@gmail.comhttps://www.eventbrite.com/e/unlock-crypto-accounts-return-of-stolen-crypto-tickets-652613804457

comments.author: bettercrypto
comments.body: What do you mean returning the stolen cryptocurrency? You mean to say if my wallet account has been hacked¬† by someone, you can resolve and get it back to me?It seems difficult to do that, I haven't seen anyone stolen here in the crypto business who got the token back to them that was lost in their wallet.So it seems hard to believe, but even so, if you really have the ability to do that, I hope you can provide a sample that you have done with such a problem.

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: Return of the jedi is more expected than the return of stolen crypto, I could save everyone 150 AED on how to keep your crypto safe, just use a cold wallet and you'd be Ok.About unlocking an exchange account, if there is a misunderstanding, the user and the exchange will work it out, if it is related to regulations and laws of certain countries, then publicly teaching people how to circumvent the laws of a country is pretty much illegal, unless UAE, is an outlaw state, I don't see a good future for this meeting.üòâ

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Sofia372 on June 12, 2023, 02:04:32 PMIn this 3 hours long program, the expert speaker, a founder and CEO of StarCompliance.io - Taras Podgorodetskiy, will share vital insights on crypto security.Taras Podgorodetskiy seems like someone who pretends to be an expert in various fields. I find them as founder of Timedom ‚Äì Ukrainian service of apartments rentals and currently CEO @ UA-Valley.com linkBoth timedom & UA-Valley.com services are dead.Can bloggers consider themselves experts in any field, when they have almost no personal experience?Quote from: digaran on June 14, 2023, 10:58:02 AMReturn of the jedi is more expected than the return of stolen crypto, I could save everyone 150 AED on how to keep your crypto safe, just use a cold wallet and you'd be Ok.This sounded like "Return of the jedi" to me too. ¬†I would say this is just an innovative way for a restaurant to sell some food.Quote from: Sofia372 on June 12, 2023, 02:04:32 PMThe talk starts at 6 p.m., on Thursday, June 15th at the restaurant üìç Gaia, DubaiNote: The minimum spend rule in the venue is 150 AED.
